# The CMIP6-ng Data

## Loading Data

```{r}
library(terra)

r <- rast("/data/scratch/CMIP6ng/cmip6-ng/pr/day/native/pr_day_CESM2_historical_r1i1p1f1_native.nc", lyrs = "pr_1")

plot(r)

```
